front.title: PPP EAP MAKE Mutual Authentication Protocol

abstract.t: This memo describes EAP-MAKE protocol, an authentication protocolbased on EAP which emphasizes on simplicity and scalability.Authentication is provided through a mechanism derived from theDiffie-Hellman scheme, and it is possible to derive and check acommon symmetric key for the purpose of privacy. Scalability isprovided by the underlying support of legacy PKI systems.
